enable_jquery.label: Enabled Jquery Libs
enable_jquery.comment: If you site load more than 2 query libs, recommend you uses this option to disable loading query libs.

route.label: Route
route.comment: Configure Blog Link, for example: http://domain.com/YOUR_ROUTER

extension.label: Extension
extension.comment: Add Your extension at end of Link, for example: http://domain.com/your_route/YOUR_CATEGORY_ALIAS.YOUR_EXTENSION

spacer_1.label: Set Width and Height for Images

keep_resize_ratio.label: Keep Aspect Ratio When Resize Images
keep_resize_ratio.comment: Enable/Disable Keep Aspect Ratio For Resize Images. Enable the blog images will been resized by width and keep aspect ratio true.

delete_old_resize.label: Delete Old Resized Images
delete_old_resize.comment: Allow delete old resized images when blog resize a image.

spacer_10.label: SE0 - Set Default Meta Key word and Meta Description

commentfacebook.label: Facebook Comment ID
commentfacebook.comment: Enter Facebook ID, for example: ves

list_layout_mode.label: Layout Mode
list_layout_mode.comment: Select a layout template for blogs list page and category page

list_limit.label: Limit Blogs
list_limit.comment: Set Maximum Blogs Show In A Page. Default value: 8

spacer_4.label: CONFIG FOR DEFAULT AND CUSTOM LAYOUT

list_leadingimage.label: List Image Size
list_leadingimage.comment: Select A Image Size For Leading Blogs

list_secondimage.label: Second - Image Size
list_secondimage.comment: Select A Image Size For Second Blogs

list_leadinglimit.label: Leading - Limit Blogs
list_leadinglimit.comment: Set Number Of Block Showing in Leading Block

list_leadingcols.label: Leading - Column
list_leadingcols.comment: Set Number Of Columns in Leading Block

list_secondcols.label: Second - Column
list_secondcols.comment: Set Number Of Columns in Second Section

spacer_40.label: CONFIG FOR GRID LAYOUT AND THUMBNAIL VIEW LAYOUT

grid_image_size.label: Image Size
grid_image_size.comment: Select A Image Size For Grid Layout

grid_col_ls.label: Columns in Large Screen
grid_col_ls.comment: Choose Number column will show in grid mode

grid_col_ms.label: Columns In Medium Screen
grid_col_ms.comment: Choose Number column will show in grid mode

grid_col_ss.label: Columns In Small Screen
grid_col_ss.comment: Choose Number column will show in grid mode

grid_col_mss.label: Columns In Mini Small Screen
grid_col_mss.comment: Choose Number column will show in grid mode

second_image_size.label: Image Size
second_image_size.comment: Select A Image Size For Second Layout

second_image_col.label: Number Column Of Image
second_image_col.comment: Choose Number column Of Image Block

second_content_col.label: Number Column Of Content
second_content_col.comment: Choose Number column Of Content Block

post_imagetype.label: Image Size
post_imagetype.comment: Select A Image Size For Detail Blog

post_showmorepost.label: Show More Post
post_showmorepost.comment: Whethere to show more post links

enable_tagmodule.label: Enable Tags Module
enable_tagmodule.comment: Show related post by tags block

cmenu_title.label: Blog Categories
cmenu_title.comment: Whethere to show Blog Categories Block

latest_typesource.label: Source Type
latest_typesource.comment: Which pages does the module show...

latest_image_size.label: Image Size
latest_image_size.comment: Select A Image Size For Latest Block

spacer_0.label: Set config for Latest comment module

module_information.label: Set Module Visable On Pages, Position
